GENERAL.FURTHERINFORMATION: A ~r~protest is occuring~w~ while blocking the road. Please await further instructions from Dispatch.
GENERAL.NOTIFICATION: The protest has now ~r~escalated to violence.~n~~y~Respond urgently.
~y~Oversee the protest~w~ until it is over. Make sure it continues smoothly.
The protest occured ~g~without escalation~w~, and is now ending.
The protest is ongoing. Please make contact with the ~o~lead protestor.~w~
The protestors are currently ~g~leaving the scene~w~.
~y~Bystander:~w~ Officer, this is ridiculous! We need traffic moving!
~y~Bystander:~w~ They're blocking the road! Move them! It's unsafe.
~y~Bystander:~w~ Officer, I told you to move 'em out the way!
~y~Bystander:~w~ Protestors who block the road can choke on this!

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~r~Suspect: ~w~We believe that climate change is ruining our country - and our government needs to act now!
~b~You: ~w~I'm sorry, you need to move. If you are protesting by blocking a road, you need to obtain authorisation first.
~r~Suspect:~w~ But why? We are protesting for a good cause!
~b~You: ~w~This protest hasn't been authorised. You can't just block the road.
~r~Suspect:~w~ I told the others about this...but they didn't listen. I'll tell them we need to go.
~b~You: ~w~Thanks. Please get your stuff together so traffic can resume.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Right guys, protest is off. Let's go now.
~r~Suspect: ~w~Look who's come to support our protest!
~r~Suspect: ~w~Food prices are sky high and we are fed up! We're gonna starve!
~b~You: ~w~This protest cannot happen here, you are putting public safety at risk.
~r~Suspect:~w~ We're not interested in moving officer. This is a just cause!
~b~You: ~w~I need you to move, you are protesting here illegally.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Officer, we are not moving! Bother someone else.
